author: COMSOL
description:
The small-strain overlay material model captures the effect of high stiffness at low strain as well as the hysteresis under cyclic loading, which is a common effect for most soils. The formulation allows stiffness degradation with an increase in shear strain and the full recovery of stiffness at load reversal.

In this example, cyclic tensile and shear tests show the stiffness degradation and the hysteresis effect with the small-strain overlay model.
label: hysteresis_small_strain_overlay.mph
name: root
